resources.string: Idle Smart needs to be activated.
Please contact Idle Smart at (913) 774-4353 to receive your activation code.
After the installation has been completed, please run the following verification to ensure the device was installed correctly.
The Kill Switch will disable all the features and will prevent Idle Smart from monitoring and starting your vehicle.
Idle Smart needs permission to enhance your experience. Click \"OK\" on the next screen.
"By pushing Power Off, Idle Smart won't monitor or start your vehicle."
